name: Gambia
takeaway: There is a heavy Chinese presence in several categories. In domestic politics, the PRC is increasing its engagements with subnational entities. The Ambassador of China has visited the mayors of both Banjul and Kanifing Municipality. According to local media, these meetings aim to foster closer ties between the municipalities and the PRC.

A major newspaper, The Standard, and a local private TV station, QTV, owned by a local GSM company, are well-known for their coverage of PRC-related content. Both media houses have had key editorial staff participate in PRC-sponsored scholarships to mainland China.
In academia, the University of The Gambia, the nation’s state university, receives significant funding from the PRC and hosts learning centers for PRC-related entities.

My country's foreign policy is heavily influenced by its relationship with the PRC. It has never condemned the PRC on issues such as Tibet or the South China Sea. Additionally, it has consistently voiced support for the PRC’s "One China Policy" in all international forums.
description-1: In 2023, Gambia had a GDP per capita of US$844 and a total population of 2.67 million people.
description-2: The Gambia established diplomatic relations with the People’s Republic of China in 1974 but switched sides to Taiwan in 1995, before switching back to China in 2013. The Gambia was ranked 58 in Reporters without Borders 2024 World Press Freedom index and ranked partly free in Freedom Status in Freedom House’s 2024 Global Freedom Status with a score of 50/100.

Media.note: The Gambia Press Union reports that there are no pratitioners who are directly affiliated to this

Foreign Policy.note: Exchanges between the legislatures of the two countries are an important part of the relations between the two countries. In September 2017, at the invitation of Zhang Dejiang, Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People’s Congress, Mariam Jack Denton, Speaker of the National Assembly of the Gambia,visited China. The National People’s Congress of China and the National Assembly of Gambia have made joint contributions to deepening the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries. China-Gambia bilateral friendship groups were also established in the legislatures of the two countries

Domestic Politics.note: In the link referenced,Gambian Minister of Foreign Affairs reiterated support for the One China Policy and emphasised the Gambia's support for China's position on Taiwan and Xinjiang: "Tangara said that he just visited Xinjiang and saw for himself the beauty of the place. The Gambia will continue to firmly pursue the one-China principle and staunchly support China's position on issues related to Taiwan and Xinjiang."
